item.title: TBI, beer, and chocolates in Leuven
item.description: Starting of #icpic2019 - listening to the most important viewpoint- that of the patient pic.twitter.com/FU8J5fWpBp — David Menon (@Menon_Cambridge) September 8, 2019 For the last month, I have been staying in Cambridge, as you perhaps have read before. However, last week was a little different. I have been flying quite a lot this year: Japan, Vienna, Cambridge, Milanâ€¦ But my final trip of 2019 commenced last week: a conference in the former beer capitol of the world, Leuven.
